pair.title: Pair the Nuki bridge
pair.intro: Enter the details of your Nuki bridge below.
pair.titleselection: What do you want to do?
pair.nodevices: No devices have been discovered. Did you push the button on your Nuki bridge during discovery? You can try again or use manual pairing if you know the IP address and token of your Nuki bridge.
pair.testing: Connection test succesful, you can now connect the Nuki bridge.
pair.unknownerror: Unknown error, are you sure you have entered the correct details and Homey is on the same network as the Nuki bridge? Please check your settings and try again.

Did not receive a token from the bridge,: Did not receive a token from the bridge, make sure you push the bridge button during pairing.
401: Token is invalid, please re-pair your Nuki
404: Smart Lock is unknown, please re-pair your Nuki
